articles.title: China's factory activity data misses expectations; Asia-Pacific markets mostly higher - CNBC
articles.description: Asia-Pacific shares were mostly higher on Wednesday as data on China's November factory activity came in lower than expected.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific shares were mostly higher on Wednesday as the reading for China's November factory activity fell short of expectations, dropping to the lowest reading since April 2022.
